(Critical)

[File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensus_provider.rs] [Function: start_consensus()] [Storage reference consistency] EpochManager receives storage.clone() while ExecutionProxyClient has its own storage access - can inconsistent storage views between these components cause state divergence during epoch boundaries? [File: aptos-core/consensus/src/consensus_provider.rs] [Function: start_consensus()] [Async task panic propagation] If NetworkTask or EpochManager panics during execution after being spawned, is the panic properly handled, or can unhandled panics in spawned tasks cause silent consensus failures?
